com.alexkasko.springjdbc.typedqueries.common

Class PlainSqlQueriesParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexkasko.springjdbc.typedqueries.common.PlainSqlQueriesParser

  • public class PlainSqlQueriesParser
extends Object
    Parses SQL queries file (as Reader or InputStream) to 'name'->'sql' map. Query name syntax: /** selectSomeData STAR_SYMBOL/ Won't close provided stream/reader.
    Author:
    alexkasko Date: 12/22/12
